public ref class CommittableTransaction sealed : System::Transactions::Transaction, IAsyncResult, IDisposable, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable
type CommittableTransaction = class inherit Transaction interface ISerializable interface IDisposable interface IAsyncResult

span.span: Describes a committable transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类为应用程序使用事务提供了一种显式方法，而不是隐式地使用 类。The class provides an explicit way for applications to use a transaction, as opposed to using the class implicitly. 与 类不同，应用程序编写器需要明确调用 和 方法以提交或中止事务。Unlike the class, the application writer needs to specifically call the and methods in order to commit or abort the transaction. 但是，只有一个事务的创建者可以提交事务。However, only the creator of a transaction can commit the transaction. 副本可提交的事务，因此，通过获取方法不是可提交。Therefore, copies of a committable transaction, obtained through the method are not committable. > [!NOTE] > 我们建议你创建使用隐式事务类，以便为你自动管理的环境事务上下文。We recommend that you create implicit transactions using the class, so that the ambient transaction context is automatically managed for you. 你还应使用和跨多个函数调用或多个线程调用需要在同一事务的使用的应用程序的类。You should also use the and class for applications that require the use of the same transaction across multiple function calls or multiple thread calls. 在此模型上的详细信息，请参阅[实现隐式事务使用事务范围](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md)主题。For more information on this model, see the [Implementing An Implicit Transaction Using Transaction Scope](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md) topic. 创建不会自动设置环境事务，这是你的代码中执行的事务。Creating a does not automatically set the ambient transaction, which is the transaction your code executes in. 你可以获取或设置通过调用静态的环境事务的全局属性对象。You can get or set the ambient transaction by calling the static property of the global object. 有关环境事务的详细信息，请参阅的"使用 TransactionScopeOption 管理事务流"部分[实现隐式事务使用事务范围](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md)主题。For more information on ambient transactions, see the " Managing Transaction Flow using TransactionScopeOption" section of the [Implementing An Implicit Transaction Using Transaction Scope](~/docs/framework/data/transactions/implementing-an-implicit-transaction-using-transaction-scope.md) topic. 如果未设置环境事务，在资源管理器上的任何操作不是该事务的一部分。If the ambient transaction is not set, any operation on a resource manager is not part of that transaction. 你需要显式设置或重置以确保在正确的事务上下文下运行资源管理器的环境事务。You need to explicitly set and reset the ambient transaction to ensure that resource managers operate under the right transaction context. 直到具有已提交，仍锁定事务所涉及的所有资源。Until a has been committed, all the resources involved with the transaction are still locked. 对象不能被重用。A object cannot be reused. 一旦具有已提交或回滚，不能在事务中再次使用或设置为当前的环境事务上下文。Once it has been committed or rolled back, it cannot be used again in a transaction or set as the current ambient transaction context. ## Examples 下面的示例创建两个新实例、 提交和汇总分别返回它们。The following sample creates two new instances of , commits and rolls back them respectively.

summary.span: 开始异步提交事务的尝试。

span.span: Begins an attempt to commit the transaction asynchronously.

returns.span: 一个 接口，该接口可由调用方用于检查异步操作的状态，或用于等待操作完成。

span.span: An interface that can be used by the caller to check the status of the asynchronous operation, or to wait for the operation to complete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 完成事务之前，此方法将立即返回。This method returns immediately, before the transaction has been completed. 然后，在另一个线程，提交此事务和`asyncCallback`完成后调用委托。The transaction then commits on a different thread, and the `asyncCallback` delegate is invoked when it has completed. 调用此方法后，你不会收到事务的结果直到你调用。After this method is called, you do not receive the outcome of the transaction until you call . > [!NOTE] > 提交进程可能会同步完成，此方法调用中。The commit process may complete synchronously inside this method call.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Commit() cil managed

span.span: Attempts to commit the transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当调用此方法时，参与该事务已注册的所有对象进行轮询，并能够独立地指示它们对提交或回滚事务的投票。When this method is called, all objects that have registered to participate in the transaction are polled and can independently indicate their vote to either commit or roll back the transaction. 如果任何参与者投票回滚事务，将回滚，此方法将引发异常。If any participant votes to roll back the transaction, it is rolled back and this method throws a exception. 为事务正常出现这种情况，你的代码应捕获和处理此类异常。This is a normal occurrence for a transaction and your code should catch and process such exceptions. 和阻止，直到事务处理的第一阶段已完成。 and block until the first phase of transaction processing is complete. 第一阶段结束后所有的资源管理器并在事务中的登记具有投票事务结果和持久决定提交或中止事务。The first phase ends after all resource managers and enlistments in the transaction have voted on the transaction outcome and the has durably decided to commit or abort the transaction. 处理的第二阶段始终是异步的。The second phase of processing is always asynchronous. 因此，没有能保证数据在给定的事务中提交从将立即可用之后时使用另一个事务来查看此数据。Therefore, there is no guarantee that data just committed from within a given transaction will be immediately available afterwards when not using another transaction to view this data. 因为此方法阻止事务处理的第一阶段完成之前，应格外小心使用此方法在 Windows 窗体 (WinForm) 应用程序或死锁时可能会发生。Because this method blocks until the first phase of transaction processing is complete, you should be extremely careful when using this method in a Windows Form (WinForm) application, or a deadlock can occur. 如果调用中一个 WinForm 控件事件 （例如，单击的按钮），此方法，并且使用同步方法来指示要执行中间处理事务，一些 UI 任务 （例如，不断变化的颜色） 的控件死锁将发生这种情况。If you call this method inside one WinForm Control event (for example, clicking a button), and use the synchronous method to direct the control to perform some UI tasks (for example, changing colors) in the middle of processing the transaction, a deadlock will happen. 这是因为方法是同步方法，并阻止工作线程，直到用户界面线程完成其作业。This is because the method is synchronous and blocks the worker thread until the UI thread finishes its job. 但是，在我们的方案，UI 线程正在还等待工作线程以提交事务。However, in our scenario, the UI thread is also waiting for the worker thread to commit the transaction. 结果是，所有线程都无法继续并且作用域将无限期等待完成的提交。The result is that none is able to proceed and the scope waits indefinitely for the Commit to finish. 应使用而非只要有可能，因为它是异步的因此不太容易发生死锁。You should use rather than wherever possible, because it is asynchronous and thus less prone to deadlock.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void EndCommit(class System.IAsyncResult asyncResult) cil managed
.method public hidebysig instance void EndCommit(class System.IAsyncResult ar) cil managed

summary.span: 结束异步提交事务的尝试。

span.span: Ends an attempt to commit the transaction asynchronously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在作为参数传递给指定的回调委托，应调用此方法方法，在完成后与异步提交关联的任何清理工作。You should call this method in the callback delegate specified as a parameter to the method, when you have finished any cleanup work associated with the asynchronous commitment. 你可以提前调用此方法，而无需等待委托。You can also call this method early without waiting for the delegate. 如果调用此方法时，事务未完成，此方法将等待它完成。If, by the time you call this method, the transaction has not completed, this method waits for its completion. > [!CAUTION] > 属性返回`asyncResult`始终`false`，即使该操作同步完成。The property returned by `asyncResult` is always `false`, even if the operation completed synchronously. 和阻止，直到事务处理的第一阶段已完成。 and block until the first phase of transaction processing is complete. 第一阶段结束后所有的资源管理器并在事务中的登记具有投票事务结果和持久决定提交或中止事务。The first phase ends after all resource managers and enlistments in the transaction have voted on the transaction outcome and the has durably decided to commit or abort the transaction. 处理的第二阶段始终是异步的。The second phase of processing is always asynchronous. 因此，没有能保证数据在给定的事务中提交从将立即可用之后时使用另一个事务来查看此数据。Therefore, there is no guarantee that data just committed from within a given transaction will be immediately available afterwards when not using another transaction to view this data.

exception.span: 调用了 ，并且该事务第一次回滚。

span.span: is called and the transaction rolls back for the first time.
